vulnerability_findings.name: inefficient-state-variable-increment
vulnerability_findings.message: <x> += <y> costs more gas than <x> = <x> + <y> for state variables.

vulnerability_findings.name: init-variables-with-default-value
vulnerability_findings.message: Uninitialized variables are assigned with the types default value. Explicitly initializing a variable with its default value costs unnecessary gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-nested-if
vulnerability_findings.message: Using nested is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-nested-if
vulnerability_findings.message: Using nested is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
ERC20NS (MockMasterChef.sol#208-211) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (MockMasterChef.sol#209)
	-transferFrom (MockMasterChef.sol#210)

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
NonStandardToken (MockMasterChef.sol#263-299) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (MockMasterChef.sol#281-285)
	-transferFrom (MockMasterChef.sol#287-292)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
MasterChef.updatePool (MockMasterChef.sol#443-457) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lpSupply == 0

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in MasterChef.deposit (MockMasterChef.sol#460-471):
	External calls:
	- updatePool(_pid) (MockMasterChef.sol#463)
	- safeSushiTransfer(msg.sender,pending) (MockMasterChef.sol#466)
	- pool.lpToken.transferFrom(address(msg.sender),address(this),_amount) (MockMasterChef.sol#468)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- userInfo (MockMasterChef.sol#469)
	- userInfo (MockMasterChef.sol#470)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in MasterChef.updatePool (MockMasterChef.sol#443-457):
	External calls:
	- lpSupply = pool.lpToken.balanceOf(address(this)) (MockMasterChef.sol#448)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- poolInfo (MockMasterChef.sol#450)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in MasterChef.updatePool (MockMasterChef.sol#443-457):
	External calls:
	- lpSupply = pool.lpToken.balanceOf(address(this)) (MockMasterChef.sol#448)
	- sushi.mint(address(this),sushiReward) (MockMasterChef.sol#454)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- poolInfo (MockMasterChef.sol#455)
	- poolInfo (MockMasterChef.sol#456)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in MasterChef.withdraw (MockMasterChef.sol#474-484):
	External calls:
	- updatePool(_pid) (MockMasterChef.sol#478)
	- safeSushiTransfer(msg.sender,pending) (MockMasterChef.sol#480)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- userInfo (MockMasterChef.sol#481)
	- userInfo (MockMasterChef.sol#482)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
MasterChef.updatePool (MockMasterChef.sol#443-457) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-sushi.mint(address(this),sushiReward) (MockMasterChef.sol#454)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
MasterChef.deposit (MockMasterChef.sol#460-471) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-pool.lpToken.transferFrom(address(msg.sender),address(this),_amount) (MockMasterChef.sol#468)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
MasterChef.withdraw (MockMasterChef.sol#474-484) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-pool.lpToken.transfer(address(msg.sender),_amount) (MockMasterChef.sol#483)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
MasterChef.safeSushiTransfer (MockMasterChef.sol#487-494) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-sushi.transfer(_to,sushiBal) (MockMasterChef.sol#490)
	-sushi.transfer(_to,_amount) (MockMasterChef.sol#492)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function

        failTransferFromAddresses[src] = _fail;
